page.title: 19EDUCATION
page.content: {Grimoldby, Lincolnshire Education There is a nursery school in Manby for the under 5's. There is a Mother and Toddler Group in Grimoldby Village Hall on weekday mornings. There is a Primary School for 5 to 11's. This is a new building on the site of the old church school. Children from two small neighbouring villages are brought to school by bus. Children over 11 years are taken by bus to secondary schools in Louth. Young people in further education from 16 years onwards go either into Louth for vocational training or for academic qualifications at Lincoln College of Further Education.
